divs: sighting detailswhile driving alone toward home in the dark about 7:47 pm, northbound on the 15 frwy around baseline ave, fontana, calif, i and surrounding vehicles and those ahead slowed to 50 mph as we all looked up and passed under an unseen, apparently stationary\slow moving object about 30-40 ft wide between a green navigation light on the left and a red navigation light on the right about 50-100 feet above us. it had blinking white lights between the navigation lights like the advertising lights on a blimp, but only blinking on the right side near the red light. i opened the right window - heard no sound. frwy was too busy to pull off the road from a middle lane. i'd like to know what it was! a lot of people saw it.
Summary: UFO above Calif I-15 Frwy while headed northbound
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Fontana
There were no other sightings in Fontana on or around December 5th 2009
